Reference

All functions

arrange_as_integer()

Arrange a column any data class as an integer

arrange_by_nchar()

Arrange dataframe based on nchar Order a dataframe based on the number of characters in the column provided as an argument.

blank_tibble()

Create a empty dataframe with column names This function takes a character vector and creates a 0-row dataframe with the vector as column name.

bring_to_front()

Bring columns to front

call_mr_clean()

General Dataframe Cleanup Convert all columns to character class and trim all left and right white spaces.

cleanup_colnames()

Standardize Column Names This function takes a dataframe and changes column names in the following order: 1) Trims whitespace on both sides, 2) converts to uppercase, 3) replaces punctuation of any length with a single underscore, 4) removes trailing underscores from native column names that often times have trailing punctuation (usually decimals)

cleanup_listnames()

Standardize List Names This function takes a dataframe and changes column names in the following order: 1) Trims whitespace on both sides, 2) converts to uppercase, 3) replaces punctuation of any length with a single underscore, 4) removes trailing underscores from native column names that often times have trailing punctuation (usually decimals)

coalesce_at()

Coalesce 1+ Fields to an Existing Field

coalesce_into()

Coalesce 1+ Fields to a New Field

cols_to_list()

Select cols and convert them to a list

dated()

Add the current date

deselect_if_all_na()

Deselect columns that are all NA

deselect_if_all_same()

Deselect columns that are all NA

filter_all_grepl_all()

Filter all the variables for all matches to the grepl phrase

filter_all_grepl_any() filter_all_grepl_any()

Filter at a variable that contains or doesn't contain a phrase

filter_at_grepl()

Filter at a variable that contains or doesn't contain a phrase

filter_at_grepl_all()

Filter at a variable that contains or doesn't contain a phrase

filter_at_grepl_any()

Filter at a variable that contains or doesn't contain a phrase

filter_by_words_in_str()

Loop a filter over words in a string This function splits a string based on the provide split argument, and recursively filters a dataframe for those words at a given column.

filter_by_words_in_str_before_zero()

Loop a filter over words in a string until there are zero rows This function splits a string based on the provide split argument, and recursively filters a dataframe for those words at a given column. It differs from the filter_by_words_in_str function because it returns a dataframe if the loop ends up evaluating to zero rows.

filter_first_row()

Filter for the first row

filter_for()

Filter a column for a set of values

filter_for_date()

Filters a dataframe for a date in YYYY-mm-dd format in a timestamp column

filter_for_today()

Filters a dataframe for today's date in a timestamp column

filter_out_row_number()

Removes a row by its number

filter_out_vector()

Filter out observations using a character vector of excluded values

filter_row_n()

Filter for a row n

format_colnames()

Format Column Names

format_names()

Standardize List Names This function takes a dataframe and changes column names in the following order: 1) Trims whitespace on both sides, 2) converts to uppercase, 3) replaces punctuation of any length with a single underscore, 4) removes trailing underscores from native column names that often times have trailing punctuation (usually decimals)

group_by_aggregate()

Aggregate Function

group_by_unique_aggregate()

Aggregate Function

hello()

Hello, World!

make_identifier()

Make a unique id

map_names_set()

Map and set_names function from purrr package in tandem

mutate1()

Mutate a column to position 1

mutate_all_as_char()

General Dataframe Cleanup Convert all columns to character class and trim all left and right white spaces.

mutate_all_blank_to_na()

Replace "" with <NA>

mutate_all_na_str_to_na()

Mutate all "NA" to <NA>

mutate_all_na_to_blank()

Substitute all true NA values in a dataframe as blank

mutate_all_rm_multibyte_chars()

Remove all multibyte characters in the dataframe

mutate_as_mdy()

Mutate given cols into a mdy date

mutate_as_ymd()

Mutate given columns to ymd date

mutate_if_not_exist()

Adds a column if it doesn't exist in the dataframe

mutate_primary_key()

Adds primary key to dataframe in position 1

mutate_rowsum()

Get the sum of the rows base on the designated columns

mutate_timestamp_column()

Add timestamp to the entire dataframe at position 1 with the provided column name

mutate_to_integer()

Mutate cols to integer data type

normalize_all_to_na()

Normalize a set of values to a true NA

normalize_at_to_na()

Normalize a set of values to a true NA

normalize_na()

Normalize NA values

parse_date_var()

Parse a Date Var

release()

Release all the columns in a dataframe into vectors of the same name

release_df()

Release all the columns in a dataframe into vectors of the same name

rename_all_prefix()

Rename all columns with a prefix

rename_all_remove()

Replace a pattern in all column names

rename_all_replace()

Replace a pattern in all column names

rename_all_suffix()

Rename all with suffix

Rename all columns with a prefix

Replace a pattern in all column names

Rename all columns with a prefix

Replace a pattern in all column names

Sample a dataframe for n obs and returns full dataframe if n > nrow
